text:
@ChrisCuomo @NYGovCuomo @NYGovCuomo YOU ARE A MURDERER! #killercuomo 
You knew what would happen putting Covid19 patients in Nursing Homes. Forcing Nursing Homes to take them. May God's wrath be upon you!
